title: Oregon Trail Type Font
content:
Looking to ID the font used in the banner of this game, Oregon Trail.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/otfont_4619.jpg)
author: arcanegel

comments.content: It looks like **[IFC Insane Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010002/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=IFC%20INSANE%20RODEO%20-%20Regular&fid=a2d418630eac24aeff218d734b4e08bc&fsize=60&text=OREGON%20TRAIL&fit=1)** by Anton Krylov (2010, Free for personal use)

This is a slab serif with median spurs. You may have an exact match in Anton Krylov's Insane Rodeo [http://www.dafont.com/ifc-insane-rodeo.font?fpp=100&text=OREGON+TRAIL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010002/http:/www.dafont.com/ifc-insane-rodeo.font?fpp=100&text=OREGON+TRAIL "http://www.dafont.com/ifc-insane-rodeo.font?fpp=100&text=OREGON+TRAIL")  
Also lots of similar fonts, including several well made ones from Font Mesa:  
Cowboy Western:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/cowboy-western/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/cowboy-western/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/cowboy-western/")  
Gold Spur  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/gold-spur/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/gold-spur/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/gold-spur/")  
Don
